entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 31 March 2023
